texto: Relationships, provide additional guidance on objectives and constraints related to assurance and security. 2) Define the project scope as established in the agreement. NOTE This includes the relevant activities required to satisfy business decision criteria and complete the project successfully. A project can have responsibility for one or more stages in the complete software system life cycle. Project Planning includes defining appropriate actions for maintaining project plans, performing assessments and controlling the project. 3) Define and maintain a life cycle model that is comprised of stages using the defined life cycle models of the organization.
